item.description: title: “Design Tips” description: “Tips On Designing RIDDL Specificatons” date: 2022-02-25T10:50:32-07:00 draft: true weight: 10 Domain Hierarchy When considering how to organize your specification into a set , there are no formal rules. Domains are fuzzy concepts on purpose. However, here are a few things that might help: Domain, Subdomain, Bounded Context, Problem/Solution Space in DDD: Clearly Defined Domain Drive Design: Domain Definition Use the communication structure of the organization per Conway’s Law Use the Event Storming and then look for the event groupings.
